Question.Subject: The videos on Lockerz won't play. HELP!?
Question.Content:
Whenever I go into the 'PLAY' section of Lockerz, i click on the video that I want to play and it just comes up with an empty black box and nothing plays.
Please help!
Question.ChosenAnswer:
Forget lockerz u cant win prizes cause they're never in stock, join swagbucks u just search and u get points which u can redeem for prizes and they are always in stock. Click the link to sign up
http://www.swagbucks.com/refer/Packers199515
